shows.title: UAP Wiki Wars / Vegas True Crime
shows.first_half: First Half: Matt Ford, host of The Good Trouble Show, joins George Knapp to discuss the coordinated targeting of Wikipedia pages for UAP disclosure advocates Christopher Mellon, Pippa Malmgren, and Harald Malmgren. He'll examine activist editor groups like Guerrilla Skeptics of Wikipedia, potential legal responses, and preview his upcoming DC briefing and UAPDF's priorities for the year ahead.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author of over 30 non-fiction books, Jack Sheehan will discuss a true crime documentary and feature film project about the drug dealer Jimmy Chagra. He'll also delve into the history of Las Vegas and some of the wild characters that helped make Sin City.

shows.title: Signs of the Tribulation / Ancient Secrets
shows.first_half: First Half: Pastor Mark Biltz is the founder and Senior Pastor of El Shaddai Ministries in Washington state. He'll discuss biblical prophecy, and what he says are signs in the heavens that show the tribulation will begin very soon.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author, explorer, and researcher of ancient sites, Patricia Cori, will speak about ancient civilizations and their hidden secrets, which are now coming to light.

shows.title: AI Transformation / Clearing Earthbound Spirits
shows.first_half: First Half: Author and creative designer Marc Beckman will bring us his latest research into the effects of AI (artificial intelligence) and how it is changing our world.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Metaphysician, shaman, and author, Ellie Pechet, will be discussing the two primary branches of her remote healing work, which focuses on clearing earth-bound spirits remotely.

shows.title: Cults & Subcultures / Astrology & Full Moons
shows.first_half: First Half: Writer, historian, and editor Christina Ward will bring us her research and work on subcultures and cults in our society.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Astrologer Mark Lerner will discuss the next two illuminating full moons of May and June, which are associated with the Festivals of Buddha and Humanity.

shows.title: Assassination Files / Desert Anomalies
shows.first_half: First Half: Author and researcher Lisa Pease will discuss the recent government release of the JFK files, as well as her investigation into the RFK assassination.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Ryan Patrick Burns is the owner of Space Wolf Research, a ranch that overlooks and shares a fence line with Skinwalker Ranch. He'll delve into the enigma of shapeshifting Native American dark adepts and other anomalous phenomena.

shows.title: Tarot Therapy / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Psychotherapist and author Art Rosengarten will present the unique benefits he has gotten from introducing tarot cards into his therapy sessions. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half.
